I think instead of putting this here we should just handle all of this in therapist. You'd need to update the .therapist.yml file to:
actions:
  flake8:
    run: flake8 {files}
    include: "*.py"
    exclude: "docs/"
  eslint:
    run: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint {files} --fix
    include: 
      - "*.js"
      - "*.jsx"
  stylelint:
    run: ./node_modules/bin/stylelint {files}
    include:
      - "*.css"
      - "*.scss"
